title: Ralph J. Slutz Student Excellence Award in Computer Science
description: To provide two annual awards (one graduate, one undergraduate) to be given to high achieving students in Computer Science, selected by a faculty committee and the Chair of the Computer Science Department at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide two annual awards (one graduate, one undergraduate) to be given to high achieving students in Computer Science, selected by a faculty committee and the Chair of the Computer Science Department at CU Boulder.
